# gcorelabs Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 0.13.0"
  required_providers {
    gcore = {
      source  = "local.gcorelabs.com/repo/gcore"
      version = "~>0.0.11"
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **gcore_api** (String) Region API
- **gcore_platform** (String) Platform ulr is used for generate jwt
- **password** (String)
- **user_name** (String)
